content: inspired by the beautiful blankets i saw online and with a basket full of very small scraps of my hand-dyed yarns i made my own version of a pattern that has already been written and passed on by many by combining the often busier speckled yarn with a solid color as a base it becomes a peaceful whole described here as a baby blanket but you can make the blanket as small or as big as you want and also from any yarn/yarn thickness let your imagination run wild and knit your own unique domino blanket main color 2 skeins undyed wol met verve merino twist sock 100g/ 365m 80% merino - 20% nylon contrast color s 11 mini s merino twist sock 20g/73m 80% merino - 20% nylon this quantity is sufficient for a baby blanket as shown in the photos size approximately 80x80 cm photo s by koelmagazine
